text:
保障します。
アニメが趣味らしく、肌は真っ白で透き通ってます。
細いんですが身体は凄く柔らかい、若さの証拠です。
そして脱がせたら胸もEカップあるとの事で、びっくりしました。
神は二物を与えないといいますが、この子は一体何物与えられて生まれてきたのやら。
興奮して吸い付いてたら乳首をビンビンにしながら感じてるようでした。
性格はかなりシャイな子ですが、手マンをしたらぐしょぐしょになってて
trans:
I guarantee it.
She seems to enjoy anime and her skin is pure white and clear.
She is thin, but her body is very soft, which is evidence of her youth.
And when I took her clothes off, I was surprised to see she has E-cup breasts.
They say that God does not give two blessings to one person, but just how many blessings was this girl born with?
I was so excited that I was sucking on her and making her nipples erected, and she seemed to be feeling it.
She has a very shy personality, but when I gave her a hand-fucking, she was soaking wet.
